Package pcvs

Class PCVS

java.lang.Object
pcvs.PCVS
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PCVS extends Object implements Serializable
The PCVS controller class defines a database to control the Private Covid-19 Vaccination Scheme
See Also:

    • getUserType

      public String getUserType(String username, String password)
      Gets the type of User by comparing the username and password in the User collection. User can be patient or administrator.
      Parameters:
      username - the value to compare.
      password - the value to compare.
      Returns:
      type of User.

    • getUser

      public Object getUser(Object obj)
      Gets User object by comparing the object reference.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compared.
      Returns:
      Patient or Administrator object. null if object is not found.

    • getHealthcareCentre

      public int getHealthcareCentre(String staffID)
      Returns the index of Healthcare Centre object by comparing the staff ID of Administrator.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the String to compare.
      Returns:
      index of Healthcare Centre.

    • getAdministrator

      public Administrator getAdministrator(String staffID)
      Returns the Administrator object by comparing staff id.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the String to compare.
      Returns:
      Administrator object, null if not found.

    • usernameValidation

      public boolean usernameValidation(String usrname)
      Returns boolean value by comparing usernames in Users collection.
      Parameters:
      usrname - the String to compare.
      Returns:
      boolean value true for equal, false for not equal.

    • validationAdminLogin

      public int validationAdminLogin(String username, String password)
      Returns index of Healthcare Centre object by comparing the username and password of Administrator to this collection
      Parameters:
      username - first String to compare.
      password - second String to compare.
      Returns:
      an int index of HealthcareCentre object.

    • validationPatientLogin

      public int validationPatientLogin(String username, String password)
      Returns index Patient by comparing the username and password to allow Patient login to PCVS application.
      Parameters:
      username - first String to compare.
      password - second String to compare.
      Returns:
      an int index of Patient object.

    • equalsBatch

      public int equalsBatch(Batch batch)
      Returns index of Healthcare Centre based on Batch object to get Healthcare Centre that offering vaccines.
      Parameters:
      batch - object to compare.
      Returns:
      an int index of Healthcare Centre.

    • getNumOfPendingByBatch

      public int getNumOfPendingByBatch(int iBatchNo)
      Returns number of pending of Batch. Sum the pending of all Batch.
      Parameters:
      iBatchNo - the index batch number to compare.
      Returns:
      an int value of number of pending.

    • getNumOfPendingByPatient

      public int getNumOfPendingByPatient()
      Returns the number of pending based on Patient collection. Calculate the pending vaccination status.
      Returns:
      an int value of number of pending appointments.

    • getQuantityAdministered

      public int getQuantityAdministered()
      Returns the number of quantity administered Batch in this Vaccine collection.
      Returns:
      an int value of number quantity administered.

    • setQuantityAdministered

      public void setQuantityAdministered(int inQty)
      Registers new quantity administered to display in Batch.
      Parameters:
      inQty - the value to set quantity administered.

    • appointmentDate

      public boolean appointmentDate(Object expiryDate, String appointmentDate)
      Returns boolean value to set the local time and compare the appointment date with expiry date from Batch.
      Parameters:
      appointmentDate - the String to compare.
      Returns:
      a boolean value true if appointment is come first before expires and vice versa.
